title: Tell me about the neighborhood where you live. What is it like?

korean: 나는 서울 외곽 쪽 주택가에 살고 있어.
조용한 주거 지역이라 살기에 정말 편해.
동네가 오래됐지만 관리가 잘 되어 있는 편이야.
걸어서 5분 거리에 편의점이랑 작은 마트가 있어서 장보기 편해.
버스 정류장도 가까워서 대중교통 이용하기 좋아.
근처에 공원이 있어서 산책하기 딱 좋아.
주말에는 주민들이 운동하거나 산책하는 모습을 많이 봐.
밤에도 조용하고 안전한 편이라 만족하면서 살고 있어.
이웃들도 대부분 조용해서 크게 불편한 건 없어.
english: I live in a residential area on the outskirts of Seoul.
It's a quiet residential area, so it's, like, really comfortable to live in.
There are many apartments and villas around.
The neighborhood is old but well-maintained.
There's a convenience store and a small mart within a 5-minute walk, so shopping is convenient.
The bus stop is also close, so it's good for using public transportation.
It takes about 10 minutes by bus to the subway station.
There's a park nearby, so it's, you know, perfect for walking.
On weekends, I often see residents exercising or walking.
Schools and hospitals are also close, so it's convenient for daily life.
It's quiet and safe even at night, so I'm living here contentedly.
Most of the neighbors are also quiet, so there's, like, nothing really inconvenient.
